attributes.description: At Kia Konfidence Hatfield we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre-Owned vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125-quality point check, Dekra roadworthy, Dekra Condition report and a valet before being delivered . All vehicles are delivered with a full service history. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs and your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you for a test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome.

attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.

attributes.description:
If you are looking for a trusted, reliable, multiple award-winning dealer to purchase your preowned vehicle from, then look no further. We offer certified used vehicles that you can trust and rely on at affordable prices with the best service. Let us structure a deal for you today. We offer in-house finance and pay top prices on all trade-ins. Nationwide delivery available upon request. No pre-fitted accessories are included in the price.
Pricing does not include on the road and service and delivery fees and is subject to in-house finance.
